pageTitle: Planned Metroline bus strike on Monday 27 November

title.title: Planned Metroline bus strike on Monday 27 November

texts: Metroline bus drivers plan to hold a third 24-hour strike, beginning at 04.00 on Monday, 27 November 2006.
Metroline and the Transport & General Workers' Union (T&GWU) have been unable to reach agreement over the 2006 pay settlement.
This proposed strike action will inconvenience thousands of Londoners.
Metroline operates 60 bus routes, mostly in north/northwest London, operating out of the following garages:
Transport for London (TfL) is working to keep passenger disruption to a minimum, and we would ask that passengers check their route and listen to media travel updates before they travel on Monday.
Where possible, we would advise passengers to use alternative means of transport.
Passenger information will be provided by TfL through a number of channels:
